text: [Bo vucudi in ojoti ravsan] ʙarxe az mardum hamtojoni ƣajr az Allohro [ʙaroi parastis] ʙarmeguzinand va onhoro hamcun Alloh taolo dust medorand, vale kasone, ki imon ovardaand, Allohro ʙestar dust dorand va onon, ki [ʙo sirku irtikoʙi gunohon] sitam kardand, hangome ki azoʙi [qijomat] – ro ʙuʙinand, [xohand donist], ki tamomi qudrat az oni Alloh taolo ast va in ki Alloh taolo saxtkajfar ast
